title: Help! League won't open!
body: Whenever I try to open league of legends it says, PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working. Has anyone else had this problem? If so, how did you fix it. I already tried to uninstall and reinstall but it did nothing. Any helpful answers would be appreciated. :^)

replies.body:
PvP.net Kernel errors are usually caused by League missing specific system permissions that it relies on in order to operate properly. I strongly recommend working through the steps outlined in our [permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to ensure these admin privileges have been granted.

Let me know if those steps resolved this issue.

Thank you soooo much. I was able to run the game as administrator. You really helped me
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

also have this issue atm.

was fine yesterday and nothing changed on my side :o
